content: Hey! Are you coming to the game night tomorrow?
Hey! I’m not sure yet. I have a lot of work to catch up on. What time does it start?
It starts at 7 PM. But no pressure! We’re just playing some casual board games.
That sounds fun! I’ll try to make it, but if I’m late, just start without me.
No worries at all. Just come if you can. We’ll save you a spot!
